actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963, as amended, and for other purposes.
short_title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments

summary.text: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments - Amends the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exclude specified categories of employers from the requirement of registering as farm labor contractors.

titles.title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963, as amended, and for other purposes.
